storyInfo: Gnosis bombs a railroad bridge. War is officially declared.

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Did you come all the way out to the boonies to dig up something good for me?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: For death and destruction, naturally.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Keep running your mouth. Though, as long as I'm on the giving side of death and destruction, I'm alright.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Almost here. Do you still remember anything about this place, Ratatos?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: ...If memory serves me right, this road leading out of Kjerag has long been abandoned since the wind and snow took down the bridge.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Blizzards are frequent, and even reinforced bridges are hard to secure. The people have all but given up on redeveloping the roads here.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: How many hands do you have at the Turicum pass?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Enough to let me know who and what Enciodes deals with every day.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Then, do you know how much military equipment and personnel have passed into Kjerag under your nose lately?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Are you saying that Enciodes bypassed Turicum and opened a railway out in a place like this?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: ...That's ludicrous.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Look, it's coming.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But that road leads straight down into a canyon...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Not anymore.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Impossible!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Tools were used to enclose the bridges, tracks, and load-bearing structures into the cliffs on both sides.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: To avoid prying eyes and ears, the structure extends from the mountain to form a bridge only when a train is about to pass...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Such a simple idea, yet incredibly intricate to implement. A pity that I didn't come up with it.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The fresh snow on the ground shudders imperceptibly, and a faint sound gradually grows stronger.
The bridge's bearings spring to life with sparks of light, just as the light of civilization shines into Kjerag.
The head of the train gallops over the bridge, segment after segment following behind it. Flames begin to dance, as if awakened by the weight of the train.
The youth turns to face the crowd and snaps his fingers.
The burning light suddenly expands, becoming brighter and warmer, engulfing several carriages in the middle of the train like a bonfire on a festival night.
Finally, unable to swallow what it had engulfed, the flames brutally split the carriage with a deafening roar.
Scintillating metallic objects splash forth like fireworks, clinking and clattering against the tenacious and resilient steel bars of the bridge before plummeting straight down.
A fur shawl dances in the flames' wake, but the sophisticated tactical suit seems indifferent.
Not a soul knows if all this happened too quickly, or if the spectacle simply paralyzed the senses. Everyone who witnessed the scene unfolding can only stare blankly, and wordlessly for a while.
Only the young man flourishes his Arts Unit nonchalantly, the snow rippling around him in waves.
He activates his Arts, letting a dazzling standard-issue military sabre gently slide down next to his feet. With but a gesture of his hand, the weapon is already in his grasp.
Victorian craftsmanship.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: It's quite sharp.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: This vague, wispy blue texture... I wonder if you've ever seen any similar metals in SilverAsh's quarries?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Let's get to the point. You want to get information about Enciodes from me, and I want to use the Browntails' power against him.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: As I said from the very beginning, I am not the only one here who needs to demonstrate good will. I am, after all, too familiar with how the Browntail clan does things.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Should you find yourselves at a disadvantage, or even realize you cannot deal with Enciodes at all, you'll capture me right away in an attempt to curry favor with him.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: But time is short. Even I cannot estimate how many people Enciodes plans to bring in, or how many weapons.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I need to act now and destroy his transport route before he has enough power to bring everything under the sun into Kjerag.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: And beyond that, I need to cut off your retreat, as you all are now my accomplices.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Even if you choose to surrender to Enciodes, you are all inextricably tied to today's explosion.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: After I seal off this path, Enciodes may well lack the manpower to fight Arctosz head-on.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Now, you no longer have a choice.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Come, arrest Gnosis!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Easy now!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Ratatos, I take it that this is your answer?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: No, Gnosis, you got one of your premises wrong.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: From the very beginning, I never trusted you. I'd never fall in that easily with a traitor.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I've always wondered how you were always walking around all high-and-mighty, even after getting kicked out of Karlan Trade.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I always believed that Enciodes let you go because the information you have means nothing to him, and he expected you to backstab him.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I assumed he was using you as an unwitting smoke bomb to mess with us, but that's no longer the case.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: How could he allow you to go around doing whatever you want, disclosing secrets like these? How could such a crucial route not be guarded by any garrisoned troops?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: You're right, we're talking about Enciodes here. He'd never let his guard down.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Don't be so hasty. After all, their original mission was to cover up the traces left in the snow by the train.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Don't get too ahead of yourself, Gnosis.
Allow me to introduce you to the squad Enciodes has been training in secret, codenamed 'Tschäggättä.'
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You, what did you say?! ...Tschäggättä?!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: They shall be as the Tschäggättä of ancient legend, not baptized in the glory of Kjeragandr, challenging superstition with pure strength.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The Tschäggättä of legend that hide in the depths of the highlands' snow-capped mountains.
The wear disconcerting masks, tie huge bells to their bodies, and wrap animal pelts around them. Kjerag children cry at the mention of their name.
But they are nothing more than legends.
The outfits worn by the troops in front of her bears little resemblance to the equipment scattered from the train. Seeing the masks on their faces, Ratatos cannot help but shiver.
The tolerance that the Master afforded you was graciously repaid with betrayal.
attributes.name: Tschäggättä

attributes.content: Round them up!
attributes.name: Tschäggättä

attributes.content: Ratatos, it is your turn to show your loyalty.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Grr... I'll remember this!
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: There is about to be an accidental avalanche caused by a lightning strike.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The subordinates secretly dispatched here by Enciodes are, unfortunately, about to disappear.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The name of the squad was something like 'Tschäggättä.' There weren't many present, but seem to have all been taken alive by Ratatos.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: The other two 'Tschäggättä' in charge of the freight train survived, but were also locked up.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: That's the extent of what I saw. I'm confident I wasn't seen.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Enciodes certainly would not see this as a simple natural disaster either.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Doctor, over here!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: To avoid drawing the Silverash clan's suspicions, I will back out for now and await the Doctor's further instructions.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Heeey, I'm glad to see you're still kickin', Doctor! Sheesh, they told me I wouldn't be able to see you because you'd be tied up with official business or something.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I was real worried that you'd be stuck with the Paleroches until the ceremony was over.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Doctor, how come you're not talking? Are you okay?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Don't tell me the Paleroches did something to you!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: It hasn't even been that long...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I guess so much stuff has happened since you were invited here that it really does seem like a long time has passed.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Oh, but I heard that you're getting along well with Mr. Arctosz?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Eh... Not sure why that would surprise me though. After all, you're really popular around Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Oh right, is there anything I can help you with, Doctor? I feel bad that it's been one thing after another since you came here, so I was thinking I could maybe run some errands for you.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.options: Can you help me protect Mr. Enciodes?;Can you say hello to the Saintess for me?

attributes.content: Huh? But with Degenbrecher there, why would my brother need me mucking things up?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But if that's what you want, I'll keep an eye on him.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: My sister's been awfully busy lately. Even I haven't had a chance to see her.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But if you really need me to, I can climb up the mountain and pay a secret visit.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ugh, I just wanted to help you out, but I just made you worry even more about me...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.options: Hmm, can you tell me some Kjerag folk tales then? Like, about the Tschäggättä?

attributes.content: Woah, where'd you hear that word?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Well... It's actually an old legend that goes way back.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Thousands of years ago, when Kjeragandr was protecting Her people from the wind and snow, a group of mountain savages rejected Her blessings. Among them––
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: We've confirmed that several segments of track suffered similar damage. The losses have been tabulated, and repairing them will take some time.
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Warrior

attributes.content: But more critically, of the points of access between Kjerag and the outside world, several of the routes that were completely under our control have been cut off.
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Warrior

attributes.content: In other words, outside forces will no longer be able to enter Kjerag without great effort.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But we still have a relative abundance of various supplies and materials in our reserves, enough to hold out while the tracks are being repaired...
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Warrior

attributes.content: That's not the important part.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Additionally, we've confirmed that Gnosis and Ratatos have been in contact and have been lingering around our borders.
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And what of the Doctor?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The Paleroche clan is no longer keeping a close watch on the Doctor. The guards are so discreet that we're unable to track them.
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Very well. You may go now.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Yessir.
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Well done.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I must admit, this came as a bit of a surprise, but Gnosis indeed has the capacity to pull off something like this.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Your idea of trust is rather twisted.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: He bore the burdens of Karlan Trade for so many years, so it's only natural that he would have the ability to exceed my expectations in certain areas.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This is not trust, but rather a base requirement. A requirement that the Silverash clan has of its associates.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I always thought I would have the right to shoulder Kjeragandr's burden only when I was prepared to shoulder all of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It has been too long since the Tri-Clan Council and the Vine-Bear Court left this burden.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Don't tell me that's why you and the Saintess have to shoulder all of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: She may eventually come to make the same choice.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And I need to prepare for the next step.
attributes.name: Enciodes
